text: Fireworks Installation and setup Authentication Using the Fireworks LLM module   This page covers how to use Fireworks models withinLangchain Install the Fireworks integration package Get a Fireworks API key by signing up at fireworks ai Authenticate by setting the FIREWORKS_API_KEY environment variable There are two ways to authenticate using your Fireworks API key Setting the FIREWORKS_API_KEY environment variable Setting fireworks_api_key field in the Fireworks LLM module Fireworks integrates with Langchain through the LLM module In this example wewill work the mixtral 8x7b instruct model For a more detailed walkthrough see here
